synopsis.text: Japanese warship spirits known as Kanmusu are humanity's last hope against the enigmatic Abyssal Fleet that has taken over the oceans. In this alternate tale to "KanColle: Fleet Girls Collection" and "KanColle: The Movie," the destroyer Shigure joins the 1st Striking Force, 3rd Group, to face the Abyssals head-on. As part of the Nishimura fleet, Shigure and her diverse team of Fleet Girls must rally together and prove their worth in the impending battle at Leyte Gulf. With the odds stacked against them, Shigure and her comrades are determined to protect each other and reclaim the seas in this potentially suicidal mission. Will they succeed in their first and possibly final mission together? Join Shigure and her fellow Fleet Girls as they embark on a courageous journey to regain control of the oceans.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
